title: JavaScript
questions: Inside which HTML element do we put the JavaScript?

What is the correct JavaScript syntax to change the content of the HTML element below?

title: C#
questions: Which of the following is correct about variable naming conventions in C#?
Which of the following defines boxing correctly?
Which of the following converts a type to a 64-bit integer in C#?
Which of the following converts a type to an unsigned big type in C#?
Which of the following access specifier in C# allows a class to expose its member variables and member functions to other functions and objects?
answers: It should not be a C# keyword.
It must not contain any embedded space or symbol such as? - + ! @ # % ^ & * ( ) [ ] { }
When a value type is converted to object type, it is called boxing.
When an object type is converted to a value type, it is called boxing.

title: Java
questions: What is the default value of float variable?
Which of the following is false about String?
What is local variable?
Dynamic binding uses which information for binding?
What is Serialization?
answers: String can be created using new operator.
String is a primary data type.
Variables defined inside methods, constructors or blocks are called local variables.
Variables defined outside methods, constructors or blocks are called local variables.
Static variables defined outside methods, constructors or blocks are called local variables.
Serialization is the process of writing the state of an object to another object.
Serialization is the process of writing the state of an object to a byte stream.
